description: This file defines a React component called 'Quiz', which implements a user interface for a multi-question quiz related to user preferences and personality. It manages state for various questions, handles submission actions, and renders UI elements including buttons, inputs, and progress indicators.

methods.name: Quiz()
methods.description: React functional component that renders the quiz UI, manages form state, and handles submission.

methods.name: toggleInterest
methods.description: Function to toggle interest selection in the interests array.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Function to handle quiz submission, updating state and redirecting.
